title: Hour 1: North Stars
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Dan Orlovsky, and Michael Irvin debate whether or not the Bucs season is over after a Week 7 loss to the Panthers. Another GOAT is trending down as Aaron Rodgers and the Packers also fall to 3-4 after losing to Washington, and our guys debate if they can still fit into the playoff picture. The World Series is set for the Astros and Phillies to battle it out and Jeff Passan is here to preview the matchup and give his take on what went wrong for the Yankees. The crew debates which team is more dangerous this season: the Ravens or the Bengals?

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Which is the more dangerous team: The Ravens or the Bengals?
